mapper.select: select m.mno, m.mname, m.mprice, m.mcontent, m.mdate, m.delchk, m.manager, mc.mtype, mi.filename from menu m left join menu_category mc on m.mcno = mc.mcno left join menu_image mi on m.mno = mi.mno order by m.mno limit #{startIndex}, #{pageSize}

select m.mno, m.mname, m.mprice, m.mcontent, m.mdate, m.delchk, m.manager, mc.mtype, mi.filename from menu m left join menu_category mc on m.mcno = mc.mcno left join menu_image mi on m.mno = mi.mno order by m.mno
select m.mno, m.mname, m.mprice, m.mcontent, m.mdate, m.manager, m.delchk, mc.mtype from menu m left join menu_category mc on m.mcno = mc.mcno where mc.mtype = #{menuType}
mapper.insert: insert into menu(mcno, mname, mprice, mcontent, mdate, delchk, manager) values(#{menuType}, #{menuName}, #{menuPrice}, #{menuContent}, now(), default, #{manager})
mapper.update: update menu set mname = #{menuName}, mprice = #{menuPrice}, mcontent = #{menuContent}, mdate = #{createDate} where mno = #{menuNo}
update menu set delchk = 'Y' where mno = #{menuNo}
